column2: You can choose 1 Warrior and 6 Spirits in your set. The Warrior will be summoned on your board at the beginning and the 6 Spirits will be added to your deck.
column3: 你可以选择1个[战士]和6个[灵]. [战士]会直接召唤到场上，[灵]则会加入卡组。

column2: Each player has a field. Player can only summon Spirits on his field. Each Field contains 7 blocks. 3 are frontline, 3 are backline, and 1 is center. Spirit may have restrictions of position. For example, it can only be summoned to the frontline.
column3: 每个玩家有一个场地。玩家可以在自己的场地上召唤[灵]。每个场地有7个格子，其中3个是前线，3个是后方，1个是中心。有些[灵]仅能召唤到前线或者后方。

column2: Each player will draw random three cards at Game Start. Then each turn, the Player can choose 1 from 3 cards randomly chosen from the deck and add it to the Hand. It's copy. The number of cards in deck remain.
column3: 每个玩家在游戏开始时抽三张卡，之后每个回合开始时，游戏随机选出三张卡组里的牌，玩家选择其中一张加入手卡。卡组不会减少。

column2: After Drawing, players can Summon or Rank Up Spirit. Beware, they both cost Mana. After using cards, press Pass button to end this phase.
column3: 抽卡阶段后，玩家可以使用手卡并消耗法力召唤或者升阶[灵]。之后按[Pass]按钮结束阶段。

column2: Next, all units will take turn one by one based on their SPD. You can use action or pass the turn. To use action, you have to Right Click the card to open Info Window and then click Action.
column3: 之后，所有单位依据SPD属性依次行动。玩家可以使用能力或者直接[Pass]。右键点击单位可以查看其资料，点击能力就可以使用。

column2: Spirit can Rank Up if the Player drags another card and drop on it. So the Player can access more powerful Spirit. All High-Rank Spirits require the two Low-Rank Spirits to have some properties. You can view Rank up detail in Deck Builder.
column3: 拖动手卡并放到另一个单位上就可以根据两张卡片的能力选择进阶成更厉害的卡。在改变卡组界面可以查看进阶的可能与条件。

column2: The conditions showed in the left is the requirement for Spirit 1 which is the Spirit on the board. It’s also the Spirit to Rank Up, so it’s called Base.
column3: 左侧的是场上的[单位](称为基石)所需要满足的条件。

column2: The conditions showed in the right is the requirement for Spirit 2 which is the Spirit in the Hand. It’s the Spirit that’s used to Rank Up, so it’s called Material.
column3: 右侧的是手卡的[单位](称为素材)所需要满足的条件。

column2: Rank Up will cost Mana as well.
column3: 升阶同样需要消耗法力。

column2: If player summoned(or Rank Up) any new Spirits (not in the deck) , then this Spirit will be added to the Deck. Therefore, player has a chance to draw the Spirit directly and summon it without Rank Up or used as Material.
column3: 当玩家召唤或进阶出新的单位（未在卡组中）时，这张卡片会加入卡组中，玩家youjihui抽到

column2: First. Thanks For Playing! This is a Card Game Demo created all by myself. So, please don't expect any fancy Images and Music.
column3: 首先，感谢游玩！这是一个个人制作的卡牌对战游戏Demo. 并没有优秀美工和音乐，请见谅.

column2: There are 2 kinds of cards, Warrior and Spirit. Warrior is like player's Avatar and Spirit is like player's minion. Destroy Enemy Warrior to win the game.
column3: 卡片分为两种[战士]与[灵]. 摧毁敌方[战士]以获得胜利.

column2: You can always right-click a card in Gameplay or in Deck Builder to see its detail.
column3: 你可以在游戏中右击卡片查看其细节。

column2: You can drag a card in hand and drop it on the board to summon it.
column3: 你可以拖曳手卡到场上来召唤它。

column2: You can drag a card in hand and drop it on a Spirit (that’s on the board) to Rank Up.
column3: 你可以拖曳手卡到场上的单位来进阶。

column2: You can right-click empty space to cancel your selection in Gameplay.
column3: 游戏中你可以右击空白处以取消你的选择。

column2: Drag card from top to center to add the card to your deck.
column3: 把卡片从上方拖到中心以加入套牌。

column2: A deck must have 1 Warrior and 6 Spirits. You can have at most 3 copies of same Spirit. You can only add basic Spirits to your deck and Rank Up in game.
column3: 一个套牌必须有1[战士]和6[灵]。同种灵可以放三张。能直接加入套牌的卡片都是基础卡片，你需要在游戏中升阶。

column2: You can drag cards to [Rank Detail] to see its Rank Up Options and Requirements.
column3: 你可以把卡片拖到[Rank Detail]按钮上以查看其进阶可能以及条件。

column2: Spirit with BREAKER can deal more damage to Spirit.
column3: 拥有[破坏者]属性的[灵]可以对[灵]造成更多伤害

column2: Spirit can't be controlled. It's either not its turn or it's enemy.
column3: 无法控制，可能还没有到其行动的回合，或者这是敌方

column2: Below are Spirits that may Rank Up to Selected Spirit
Above are Spirits that selected Spirit may Rank Up to
This Action is still in Cooldown. You may Pass turn instead.
column3: [行动]还在冷却中,你可选择[Pass]你的回合.

column2: Player need to pay COST to summon Spirit. And some Spirit needs to cost Mana to use Ability.
column3: 玩家需要消耗法力召唤[灵]

column2: Choose one Card add to your Hand
column3: 选择一张加入你的手卡

column2: DURABILITY is like hitpoint. When it reaches 0, unit is destroyed. There's no maximum value.
column3: [DUR]下降为0时,单位死亡. [DUR]没有上限.

column2: Unit with Evanescent will be destroyed automatically. It losses DUR at end of its turn( or gain DUR if it's Negative)
column3: 消逝属性会让单位在每回合结束时损失DUR。

column2: This Action will cost Mana, make sure you have enough of it.
column3: 这个[行动]需要消耗法力

column2: DUR becomes negative, so common damage effect only makes it more durable. You need to gain its DUR until it reaches 0.
column3: [DUR]变成负数,当其提升至0或以上时才会死亡.普通的伤害只会加强它.
未达成任何进阶的条件

column2: POWER isn't like ATK. It's rather an evaluation than a strength. Not all abilities can benefits from POWER.
column3: 不是所有的能力都需要[POW],但是它是进阶的重要标准.

column2: The red icon indicate this Spirit has Sacrifice Property. It means even the base Spirit is used as Material (in hand), this Spirit will still be considered as a possible result of Rank Up as the base Spirit is Base.
column3: 红印表示[牺牲]属性，若可进阶单位用作素材，这个[灵]会被视为可进阶的选择之一。

column2: Unit with SHIELD will take less damage.
column3: 护盾属性减免所受伤害

column2: SPEED determines the order of Spirit to take action.
Increase Maximum amount by 1 at turn start each turn until reach the limit 7.
column3: 每回合提升最大值1，直到7.

column2: These icons show which postion the unit can be summoned on.
column3: 表示[灵]可以召唤的位置

column2: This Spirit can extend another Spirit's lifetime. But only Fairy Type Spirit can really benefit from it.
column3: 一个可以延长其他[灵]生命的[灵]，但只有妖精可以受益。

column2: Target Ally Spirit DUR+1. And its DUR-1 at Whole Turn End if it's not Fairy Type
column3: 友军目标DUR+1.如果不是妖精，则总回合结束时DUR-1。

column2: The DUR it gains will be lost very soon.
Every Warrior will have its own flag, but the basic effects are same, make Legion Spirit Stronger.
column3: 每个战士都有自己的旗帜，但是基本效果一样，强化军团[灵]。

column2: All Ally Legion Spirits Breaker+1 while on board.
column3: 当在场时，所有友方军团[灵]获得[破坏者+1]

column2: This Spirit creates a Domain which constantly apply Yin and Yang.
column3: 这个[灵]构筑了一个领域。

column2: All Enemy POW-1 while all Ally POW+1.
Useless Spirit that's meant to block Enemy field. However, it may become useful and powerful.
column3: 无用的[灵]，能够占据敌方的位置。但是它有可能变得强大。

column2: After being destroyed, summon a useless Shadow on a Random Position of Enemy field.
column3: 被破坏后，在敌方随机位置召唤一个无用的[影子]。

column2: The iconic Spirit of Legion's Defensive Power.
Enhance defense. Spirits in frontline and Warrior will take less damage.
column3: 强化防御。前线的[灵]和战士受到更少伤害。

column2: This Spirit can mess Enemy up.
Summon a useless Shadow on Enemy Field.
column3: 在敌方场上召唤一个无用的[影子]。

column2: This Spirit can move around and threat Enemy's backline.
column3: [灵]拥有灵活的移动力，并能够威胁敌方后卫。

column2: Deal [same as POW] damage  to Enemy Spirit in the backline of same column.
column3: 对同一列敌方后排的敌人造成[等同于POW]的shanghai

column2: This Spirit can provide great support to Legion Spirit.
column3: 对军团支援的辅助型[灵]

column2: Target another Legion Spirit. Its DUR + [same amount as POW] if there are two other Legion Spirit with higher power in the same line. Otherwise, +1.
column3: 如果同一行有其他两个相同或更高POW的军团型[灵]，那么目标其他军团型[灵] DUR+[等同于POW]的数值，否则只+1。

column2: Target another Legion Spirit. Its POW + [same amount as POW] if there are two other Legion Spirit with higher power in the same line. Otherwise, +1.
column3: 如果同一行有其他两个相同或更高POW的军团型[灵]，那么目标其他军团型[灵] POW+[等同于POW]的数值，否则只+1。

column2: Target Legion Spirit +1 Breaker. If there are two other Legion Spirit with equal or higher power, then +2 instead.
column3: 如果同一行有其他两个相同或更高POW的军团型[灵]，那么目标其他军团型[灵] [破坏者+2]，否则只+1。

column2: Target Legion Spirit +1 Shield. If there are two other Legion Spirit with equal or higher power, then +2 instead.
column3: 如果同一行有其他两个相同或更高POW的军团型[灵]，那么目标其他军团型[灵] [hudun+2]，否则只+1。

column2: The basic spirits in Legion. It has great potential.
Damage all Enemy in front. Deal [Pow] damage to Spirit and Warrior.
column3: 对前方所有敌人造成[等同于POW]的伤害。

column2: Attack Enemy in front. Deal [POW] damage to Spirit and 3 damage to Warrior. It can reach 2nd block if there's no Enemy on the 1st.
column3: 攻击前方敌人，对[灵]造成[等同于POW]的伤害，对[战士]造成[3]点伤害。如果第1格没有敌人，可以攻击到第2格。

column2: Attack Enemy in front and adjcent Enemy. Deal [Pow] damage to them
column3: 攻击前方和邻近的敌人，对[灵]造成[等同于POW]的伤害。

column2: Attack Spirit in front. Deal 1 damage to it.
column3: 攻击前方敌人，造成[1]点伤害

column2: Attack Spirit in front. Deal 1 damage to it. If there are two other Legion Spirit with equal or higher power,then self Gain 1 DUR.
column3: 攻击前方敌人，造成[1]点伤害。如果同一行有其他两个相同或更高POW的军团型[灵]，那么自己DUR+1

column2: Enhance Soldier with Pike. It increase its range and power of attack. It's the first threat of enemy Warrior.
column3: 用长枪强化士兵，增加其射程，使其能够伤害[战士]

column2: Attack Enemy in front. Deal 1 damage to it. It can reach 2nd block if there's no Enemy on the 1st.
column3: 攻击前方敌人，造成[1]伤害。如果第1格没有敌人，可以攻击到第2格。

column2: Enhance Soldier with Saber. It increase its range and power of attack.
column3: 用军刀强化士兵，增加其射程和力量。

column2: Attack Enemy in front and adjcent Enemy. Deal 1 damage to them
column3: 攻击前方和邻近的敌人，造成[1]伤害

column2: Enhance Pikeman with Heavy Armor, dramatically increase its durability. And, be careful, danger is near.
column3: 用重甲强化枪兵，大幅度提升其耐久。

column2: Attack Enemy in front. Deal [POW] damage to Spirit and 1 damage to Warrior. It can reach 2nd block if there's no Enemy on the 1st.
column3: 攻击前方敌人，对[灵]造成[等同于POW]的伤害，对[战士]造成[1]点伤害。如果第1格没有敌人，可以攻击到第2格。

column2: The basic element of Nature. Its power and effect can expand.
Target POW - [same amount as POW] until end of the turn.
column3: 直到回合结束 目标POW - [等同于POW]的量

column2: The basic element of Nature. Its power and effect can expand.
Target POW + [same amount as POW] until end of the turn.
column3: 直到回合结束 目标POW + [等同于POW]的量

column2: The base form of Fairy Type. Its mobility grants it various path of Rank Up.
column3: 拥有移动力的妖精的基础形态

column2: The Warrior who is known by his leadership. He is expert in command Legion Type Spirit.
column3: 一位以领导力闻名的战士，擅长使用军团型[灵]

column2: Target one of your spirit. Until the end of this turn, it gains Formation if it's Legion. Otherwise, it gains Legion Type.
column3: 选择一位友方[灵]，直到回合结束，其被视为军团型，如果本身是军团型则获得[阵型]状态

column2: Unit will be considered as there're two other Legion Spirits with higher power in the same row.
column3: 这个单位被视为有两个POW相同或更高的军团型[灵]在同一行。

column2: Unit will be considered as Legion type.
